Package com.cis.gorecipe.controller

Class FoodImageController

java.lang.Object
com.cis.gorecipe.controller.FoodImageController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/images") public class FoodImageController extends Object
This class handles the API endpoints related to uploading images of ingredients and the processing of those images

  • Method Details

    • uploadImage

      @PostMapping("/upload") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Ingredient> uploadImage(@RequestParam("image") Byte[] bytes, @RequestParam("user") UserDTO userDTO)
      Parameters:
      bytes - a JPEG image as a bytestream
      userDTO - the user who has uploaded the image
      Returns:
      the ingredient that GoRecipe has determined to be in the image

    • getUserImages

      @GetMapping("/user/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FoodImage>> getUserImages(@RequestBody UserDTO userDTO)
      Parameters:
      userDTO - a GoRecipe user
      Returns:
      a list of images uploaded by the specified user

    • getImage

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Byte[]> getImage(@PathVariable("id") String id)
      Parameters:
      id - the FoodImage/AWS S3 object ID of the image
      Returns:
      the image specified by the id
